abstract: Chevron, the oil behemoth, intends to sell what amounts to a stake of about 12 percent in the energy company Dynegy through a public stock offering. Chevron U.S.A. will offer 96.9 million Class A Dynegy shares in a sale that will be managed by Goldman Sachs.
lead_paragraph: Chevron, the oil behemoth, intends to sell what amounts to a stake of about 12 percent in the energy company Dynegy through a public stock offering. Chevron U.S.A. will offer 96.9 million Class A Dynegy shares in a sale that will be managed by Goldman Sachs.

headline.main: Chevron Plans Offering of Dynegy Stake
